sen.j: 片岡 芦燕（かたおか ろえん）は、歌舞伎役者。
sen.e: "Roen KATAOKA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: ここでは特定の一人の役者のことを説明しているのではなく、複数の役者に使用されてきた「名前」について言及しているため、そのことが明確になるように訳出いたしました。
sen.e: "Roen KATAOKA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Roen KATAOKA" is a name which has been used by several Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
The current Roen is the sixth generation.
The current Roen is the sixth generation.

sen.j: - 片岡仁左衛門 (8代目)の俳名。
sen.e: The name was used as a haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used both officially and privately) of Nizaemon KATAOKA the Eighth.

sen.j: - 後の2代目片岡我童（片岡仁左衛門 (9代目)を追贈）の俳名。
sen.e: The name was used as a haimyo of Gado KATAOKA the Second (he was also granted the name of Nizaemon KATAOKA the Ninth after his death).
